targetApplication: Web-based counter with increment, decrement, and reset

intents.description: Display counter value on page load

outcome.userVisible: User sees '0' displayed in counter element
outcome.measurementMethod: DOM query for counter value element shows '0'

acceptanceCriteria: Counter element exists in DOM after page load
Counter element is visible to user

intents.description: Increment counter when increment button clicked

state.precondition: Counter is displayed with current value N
state.requiredState: Increment button is enabled and clickable

effect.stateChange: Counter value changes from N to N+1

outcome.userVisible: Counter display updates to show N+1
outcome.measurementMethod: DOM query shows counter value increased by exactly 1

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking increment button increases displayed value by 1

intents.description: Decrement counter when decrement button clicked

state.precondition: Counter is displayed with current value N where N > 0
state.requiredState: Decrement button is enabled and clickable

effect.stateChange: Counter value changes from N to N-1

outcome.userVisible: Counter display updates to show N-1
outcome.measurementMethod: DOM query shows counter value decreased by exactly 1

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking decrement button decreases displayed value by 1

intents.description: Reset counter to zero when reset button clicked

state.precondition: Counter is displayed with any value N
state.requiredState: Reset button is enabled and clickable

effect.stateChange: Counter value changes from N to 0

outcome.measurementMethod: DOM query shows counter value equals 0

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking reset button sets displayed value to 0
Works regardless of current counter value

intents.description: Prevent counter from going below zero

trigger.condition: User clicks decrement when counter value is 0

outcome.userVisible: Counter display remains at '0', decrement has no effect
outcome.measurementMethod: DOM query shows counter value still equals 0 after decrement attempt

acceptanceCriteria: Decrement button click at 0 keeps value at 0
